name: Friend Simulator (SnoozyBinch)
description: I've spent a lot of time working on this game, and now I'm ready to move on to the next game. There's still some stuff that I would like to fix, but for now this is it! There are 2 endings and you can see things I started to work on, but decided to leave unfinished in order to get to work making something new that will improve upon what I learned with this project.  Default RPGMaker controls (no WASD, arrow kets/num pad with enter/space bar/ 0 num pad)
